info.name: overview of blooket dashboard
info.description: The Blooket dashboard is the primary interface for users on the Blooket platform. It offers a range of features and functionalities for educators and students. overview of blooket dashboard include game creation, class management, data tracking, settings, notifications, and access to a library of pre-made games. Users can customize their profiles, find resources, and receive support through the dashboard. The dashboard serves as the central hub for managing educational activities and fostering interactive learning experiences.
